channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 6 Best Smart Speakers (2025): Alexa, Google Assistant, Siri
item.description: Looking to add a smart speaker to your house so Alexa, Siri, or Google can help you out? Here are the best ones to get.

item.title: No One Is in Charge at the US Copyright Office
item.description: During a wild time for copyright law, the US Copyright Office has no one at the helm—and no one knows when that will change.

item.title: Rollback rates: TechCrunch All Stage brings back early launch prices for a limited time
item.description: We’re almost there, and ticket rates have officially rolled back with savings of up to $425. TechCrunch All Stage, the founder summit of the year, is ...

item.title: 12 Best Standing Desks of 2025, Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Take your home office to new heights with our favorite motorized standing desks.

item.title: OpenAI hires team behind AI recommendation startup Crossing Minds
item.description: Crossing Minds, a startup that provides AI recommendation systems to e-commerce firms, said its team is leaving the company to join OpenAI.

item.title: German data protection official wants Apple, Google to remove DeepSeek from the country’s app stores
item.description: Germany has told Apple and Google to remove Chinese AI app DeepSeek from their app stores, saying the company transfers users' data to China illegally...

item.title: David H. Rosmarin brings a founder-focused approach to anxiety at TechCrunch All Stage
item.description: Startups demand constant decision-making, pressure-filled pivots, and bring big emotional swings. It’s no wonder anxiety shows up at every stage. But ...

item.title: Denmark clamps down on deepfakes by letting people copyright their own features
item.description: The Danish government is working to change copyright law to give its citizens a right to their own body, facial features, and voice. The landmark law ...

item.title: The 8 Best Drones (2025): Flight-Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Whether you want to battle Star Wars spaceships or shoot a cinematic masterpiece, one of these drones is going to be perfect for you.

item.title: The Best Cat Toys for Your Furry Friend (2025)
item.description: Based on years of testing with our cats, these are our favorite WIRED-approved, tech-y cat toys and scratchers.
